channel.title: ScottHansonDE tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from ScottHansonDE.

item.description:
@techman53 Thatâ€™s a lot of questions at one time! ðŸ˜€ I was motivated to not be dependent on my wife for German daily life. And without internet I had to inform myself and solve my problems in German. It took about 3 years to become truly competent in the language, though.

@techman53 I grew up in Minnesota and met my wife when she was an exchange student in high school. We married 3 years later and lived in the US 7 years before moving to Germany (for a career opportunity for her). I had visited Germany a few times so I knew what I was getting into.
